azurerm_automation_variable_string.description: Manages a string variable in Azure Automation.

name.description: The name of the Automation Variable. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Automation Variable. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

automation_account_name.description: The name of the automation account in which the Variable is created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

description.description: The description of the Automation Variable.

encrypted.description: Specifies if the Automation Variable is encrypted. Defaults to `false`.

value.description: The value of the Automation Variable as a `string`.

id.description: The ID of the Automation Variable.

create.description: Used when creating the Automation String Variable.

update.description: Used when updating the Automation String Variable.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Automation String Variable.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Automation String Variable.
